item.title: Test
item.description: Test notebook This is a test notebook to see if I can embed the notebook into a Hugo site. import pandas as pd import numpy as np import matplotlib.pyplot as plt data = {'apple': 10, 'orange': 15, 'lemon': 5, 'lime': 20} names = list(data.keys()) values = list(data.values()) fig, axs = plt.subplots(1, 3, figsize=(9, 3), sharey=True) axs[0].bar(names, values) axs[1].scatter(names, values) axs[2].plot(names, values) fig.suptitle('Categorical Plotting') Text(0.5, 0.98, 'Categorical Plotting') Second H2 This is another section of my test post showing how it will render in the hugo site.
